website_summaries.verdict: An affordable line of sandbags that perform well. Solid construction thanks to special weaving process.
pros: Features double-chain stitching, so bags are strong enough to hold up to 50 lb
Sturdy and durable with a tensile strength of at least 30lb
Equipped with UV inhibitor to withstand direct sun exposure up to 6 months
cons: Some reports of ripping after a couple days of use and a flimsy pre-attached string that shreds the bag when closing it

customer_reviews.title: You asked me to review sandbags.
customer_reviews.text: They're sandbags. You put sand in them. How complicated do you want me to make this review. The bags hold sand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad F

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: I have filled many sandbags in many different countries and these are some of the best. I love that the ties are built in, which is much nicer than having to keep a bunch of ties in my pocket. I haven't had them very long, so I can't speak to how durable they'll be after a long time. I live in the panhandle of Florida, lots of humidity and crazy rain all year, and these are used to route water from my house. I also like how they give you many options when it comes to quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Gridsquare

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bags
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find any bags locally so I looked on amazon, read reviews, looked at others but decided to go with these. Husband started filling them right away with some left over decomposed granite.. glad they give you 10, turns out he needed more than he thought. Anyway they’re working great and price is a great value, only about a buck a bag! The only thing he wished was that the tie strings were a little lower, would make it easier to tie. Other than that he was happy with my choice 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Bags are well built
customer_reviews.text: Filled well to direct rainwater. Liked the ties hooked into the bag for convenience
customer_reviews.author: Steve m

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!  Terrible UV Protection
customer_reviews.text: These bags didn't even last a month in direct sunlight in East Idaho which rarely gets to 90 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: A Dude in the Idaho Wilderness

customer_reviews.title: How we used them
customer_reviews.text: After a very hard rain we were dealing with our driveway literally caving in. We purchased and used these sand bags up at the top of driveway edge to detour the water from coming down in same trench. Since we put them down we have had several heavy rains and the bags are still there exactly the same as when we put them down. I would absolutely recommend them! Fast shipping as well
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Richards

customer_reviews.title: Right size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: These sturdy bags are just the right size for me to be able to lift them after they've been filled. We use them to create a bridge on our driveway entrance when moving our RV in and out of our property and they've held up great. I'll be using the extra ones to store my elephant ear bulbs that need to be protected from the freezing ground this winter. Great buy, sent in no-waste packaging, and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bags are good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags to put lava rocks in that we bought to help keep weeds out of an area after putting down the plastic and all other requirements to stop plants from growing. It just made a beautiful place for almost 9 foot hollyhocks to grow threw it which I have pictures to prove so had to take them all out and wash them and hopefully someone will want them. Anyway the bags are currently holding the stupid lava rocks nicely😑They are good bags.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect took 900 lbs of sand to fill 24 bags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Currently using 1000 of these bags to combat Lake Huron erosion
customer_reviews.text: Lake Huron levels are rising and taking away my mother’s beach, so I bought 1000 of these bags and ordered sand from a different company and now these bags are being used to build up structures to help break the waves. They are a great price and working extremely well! Thank you for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Block

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Such a rip-off u think u will get sand bags but u get couple weird looking tubes,dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: karwan falamerz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STURDY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags first for my home, i got the 30 bags and they are nice and sturdy. We were able to fill them up and tie them up without any issues!. We bought them in preparation for hurricane season and since I am in houston, we get lots of flooding. My house will get some water in from the back of the house and I hope these help out some. My boss also purchased them for her rental property, that got flooded last year.
customer_reviews.author: violeta ayala

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Hurricane Dorian
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these once so far for Hurricane Dorian. The city was distributing some sandbags and there is no comparison to what the city gives you and Sandbaggy. These bags are much sturdier than the city ones. Very happy with the quality so far. Let's hope for no more hurricanes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Beech

customer_reviews.title: Sun, step on resistant sand bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags lasted over a year filled with sand in the hot direct sun! Others we have tried have split open in a couple of months because they couldn't handle the heat. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dimella

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbags
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these quickly from Amazon. Was able to fill with small stones/pebbles to help protect during possible hurricane Dorian coming through. Still have two bags on my sons basketball net for weight redundancy should the gardener decide to cut the base again and drain the water out without me knowing. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Mixer Spock

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for sandbags
customer_reviews.text: I have had 70 lbs tubes of sand for my trucks here in Northern Illinois winter for many years. Those bags finally wore down and didn't want to buy new sandbag tubes filled with sand. Found these and transferred all of the sand from the tubes to these. Great quality and hope they hold up for a few years mainly for my truck beds to weigh them down during snow seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I began putting my sandbaggers to work. The double stitched bottoms and the solid thickness of the bags has me feeling pretty good about this product. Of course, time will tell whether they hold up, but I am optimistic. I have used sand bags from other manufacturers that were good and these compare favorably.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Tough
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pile of bricks in these things, stored outdoors for almost a year now. No signs of ripping, the fabric is still good. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Used as weight for truck bed
customer_reviews.text: Will have to wait to see how they handle over the winter. Used these to fill with dirt/sand to add weight to truck bed for winter road conditions.
customer_reviews.author: John P Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Had them for about 3 days and already starting to rip at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: richard crampton

customer_reviews.title: Met need at great price and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Liked the quantity option and price points while shopping. The color options were good. Included ties were convenient to complete the filling process. Fit the need and were study enough to withstand rough handling when being placed. As this is the first time using this brand I can't comment on the long-term durability but it is not unreasonable to imagine they'll handle what we expect them to do. I need more to complete my job and I'm not hesitating to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dabrowski

customer_reviews.title: Used 27 bushels of sand to fill 100 Sandbags
customer_reviews.text: Used these to shore up our creek bank. Used about 27 bushels of sand to fill 100 bags. Built-in ties are a nice feature, although I still think the cost is too high by about 30%...but the convenience and quick delivery of Prime do add value to the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Samson

customer_reviews.title: Good Sandbags
customer_reviews.text: They are green, they hold sand, easy to fill, they tie shut easily, they appear to be robust. Time will tell how many months they last in bright southwest sunlight, but the bags look great so far.
customer_reviews.author: WaggRnch1

customer_reviews.title: Great Sand Bags for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 50 qty sets to line our house from water and this did the job. It was sturdy and durable. The only reason it didn't earn a 5 stars was because it was difficult to tie the bags. Kind of annoying to be honest. I wish there was a 'fill' line so you know how much 50lbs would be.
customer_reviews.author: BEB

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These worked great to create a water barrier on all sides of my barn so my horse stalls don't flood.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add a little weight to the back of my truck. I only needed 4 so a 10-pack worked out fine. If these start to leak or decompose over time I still have 6 more. They were easy to fill and tie off. The truck doesn't jostle me around as much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Big Blue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike I had is the order for 50 bags came with 49 neatly folded and inside of the 50th bag. The 50th bag had the bag ties cut off for some reason, and I had to improvise the tie. Otherwise it is very strong material, easy to work with, and appears durable. My primary use for them was to re-bag my older sandbags that were ripped and deteriorating. Perfect, quick solution.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: This bag is about the same as the white ones you can get at most hardware stores
customer_reviews.text: Thought the label of 'military grade' meant something more sturdily built than ones I've purchased before but it's pretty much the same except for the color. The previous ones I purchased lasted about 2 years and these seem like they will have same life. Only good thing was price was better since purchased in larger quantity
customer_reviews.author: abaper_va

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sandbags.
customer_reviews.text: I am using these sand bags for a Church prop. My order was delivered quickly. Sand bags appear to be of good quality material. I'm very pleased with my purchase, and I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Velma Mitchell"Granny"

customer_reviews.title: Solicited Feedback in exchange for a discount with a flyer in the product
customer_reviews.text: The product seems OK. It's a sandbag. What bugged me is the product included a flyer asking for me to leave them feedback and offering a discount on future purchases. I don't like that - I've bought too many "five star" items that were junk as a result!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected! Already filled the bags with sand and placed on downside of a hill with large oak tree. They will be a big help in controlling rain runoff and soil erosion problem in that area, especially with the amount of rain we're expecting from the remnants of hurricane Sally. The bags arrived in time, as promised, and their dark green color blends in well with the landscape. Will definately buy again and finish the project on that side of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GREEN-Arrived White
customer_reviews.text: If I had wanted White I would have placed an order for White. These "GREEN COLOR sandbags: allows for use on construction sites, landfills, and flood protection around homes/buildings" arrived White and not want I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: darthstitt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: Coming apart. All I did was fill them with sand and sit in the garage. Picked them up to move them. Had holes. Sand coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be quality, but cannot comment on durability until I have used for an extended period of time. At this point I have no problem recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Coal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and tie off
customer_reviews.text: These sand bags worked out great. I held them while my husband filled them and I didn’t think it was to hard and were not young. I’m glad the storm missed us this time but we were prepared and the bags were ready.
customer_reviews.author: Pattycake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use sand bags.
customer_reviews.text: Great sand bags even the bag tie is included on the bag just fill and tie them up simple. I do remember filling sand bags while in the Army in Vietnam 50 years ago not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: eric teets

customer_reviews.title: I’m sorry that I needed them
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the way it took me back 51 years since the last time I filled sand bags. Just kidding but that was the last time I filled them in Vietnam......
customer_reviews.author: lou murray

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This year we have had unprecedented rainfall and it literally came rushing down our driveway. We used these sandbags to break the rushing water and redirect the flow. They work great, SUPER FAST shipping, very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the flimsy white ones I ordered prior to these. We will see when they are in the elements for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Benne

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little bit wider.
customer_reviews.text: Help up well. A held a little less than I expected, so I'm glad I bought plenty. Not quite as wide as most shovels so there's considerable spillage while you're filling them. But an excellent price makes up for the minor incomvenience.
customer_reviews.author: David Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags aren't glamorous but get them before you need them
customer_reviews.text: These met expectations. Honestly I can't give them five stars because how do I justify TOTALLY AWESOME sandbags? I need sandbags to prep for the next emergency, now I have them. I win.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to be good sandbags
customer_reviews.text: I had sand bags that were in sad shape from being used for two hurricanes that hit us in one year. I was able to put those bags into the new bags I purchased. That should extend the bag's life to be available for another hurricane. The quality of the new bags seemed to be really good.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Berrier

customer_reviews.title: Sandbag that water!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very promptly, actually 1 day ahead of schedule. Worked nicely. Strong. Although some people complained about the ties in some reviews, I found them to be very strong and durable. Now to see how long they last in place.
customer_reviews.author: uu

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cottage on Lake Huron and the lake is getting very high. I have similar bags on a hill that are over 30 years old and most are still holding sand.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyMac

customer_reviews.title: Toigh, durable, flexible, lightweight - what more could you ask for in a sandbag?
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and tough, ties attached - I personally filled 600 of these to create a retaining wall for an Indiana lake flood prone area. The bags are sized to accomodate various volumes of sand" crucial for a do-it-yourselfer like me!
customer_reviews.author: reba

customer_reviews.title: A Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Better than larger bags which I struggle to lift or move after it's filled 1/3 of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Most never need sand bags, but if you do... this is a good product. It is sturdy and easy to use.... just add sand.
customer_reviews.author: Re_CTO

customer_reviews.title: Long delivery time...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the bags after a few weeks......but the delivery person didn't even bother to hit the ringer/bell so I found the package by accident!
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: duracility
customer_reviews.text: product was delivered quickly, was complete and ready to use. In my environment the top layer of sand bags are exposed to direct sun light 360 days a year. With that exposure the bag material starts break down after four years. Not a fault of the material just a fact!
customer_reviews.author: Laserboy

customer_reviews.title: Good to have on hand,,you never know when needed
customer_reviews.text: They are Great,dont know why I waited so long,,very sturdy,easy to fill,,do the job,,good to know I have them,when needed
customer_reviews.author: bernadette cawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags for water issue
customer_reviews.text: I originally believed I received the wrong age, but the green bags were wrapped in a white one. Sandbaggy quickly contacted me to resolve. The bags arrived as expected. We haven’t used, but are exactly what we were wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far holding up very well, used to make dams in my creek. They hold a lot of material and the built in ties are very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Brett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: These are really strong bag. Have only used one season but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Je

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected- very sturdy. The ties are a bit of a challenge but work fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well. They seem tough. I had to line the edge of the road next to my house to stop rain runoff. They have held up well and make a fairly good waterproof barrier until a curb can be put in.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but leaks sand
customer_reviews.text: Not too expensive and great sand bags with built in ties that work well. Just as a heads up the bags do leak the sand out slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Running

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bags, will not disintegrate on you.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to bag up extra garden soil and share with my neighbors. Neighbors have returned the bags and I have refilled them multiple times. Bags still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Sun rays do not have much effect on them.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact they were camo and blend into the background, and the high durability they possess. We live on a lake. I used them to keep the lake water back from eroding my lawn. My first order was 50 and my second order was 100. We are very well pleased with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia T. Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: How to stack and how full to make them.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my application. Watching YouTube instructions for water tight applications helped make this a successful task.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope I don't need them but I got them since hurricanes don't wait for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: D. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Just as you would expect...:-)
customer_reviews.text: Product looks just as described...will fill these should we get any inclement weather concerns. Will revise should they not work as described. :-)
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as needed. I filled them with pea gravel and use them to shore up the sides of my drieway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good price and durability
customer_reviews.text: The bags are a great deal and well made. Their capacity for sand is about 40-45 lbs. Would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large enough, easy to tie up and sturdy. Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We received our order promptly, and so far, we are very pleased with the product. They appear to be very durable and tying them was easy. Ties really tight and secure. The green color blends in well with the landscape.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We got these to place in front of basement door and it has helped alot.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Bags work well.
customer_reviews.text: These bags worked out well for me. The flat string these use is pretty strong (not the strongest I've used) but stays tied unlike the round string used by other vendors. I'll be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: Good sand bags
customer_reviews.text: Good bags, I use them for a rifle rest like I did in the army, can’t get any more steady at the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Byron j

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags what can I say
customer_reviews.text: Sandbag seem strong and sturdy enough for the job they were intended for
customer_reviews.author: John Absher

customer_reviews.title: It holds sand.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and its green. Heavier duty than most others,
customer_reviews.author: A. Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Big bags.
customer_reviews.text: I used Pea Stone for filler. On the larger end for sand bags. Tough.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: good  for my needs
customer_reviews.text: its a sandbag, dont leak or tear easy.. what else is needed?
customer_reviews.author: nude1`

customer_reviews.title: Durable sandbag bags with  I assorted colors.
customer_reviews.text: These Bags work great for holding sand. I replace my old bags with this. I love that they come in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags met all expectations
customer_reviews.text: The bags worked great, had pull strings for closing. Seem sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I filled the sandbags and am using them in my garden to hold down agricultural film over the beds. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to larger sand bsgs.
customer_reviews.text: Made it easier to yoss in the truck bed for winter.
customer_reviews.author: TMP

customer_reviews.title: Works when dropped from four feet.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are nice. They seem sturdy, (drop from four feet filled), and are easy to fill with two people working as a team. I shall see how long they last in the outdoor weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This product performed very well at holding back erosion. We used them on our beach area and we have not lost any sand this year from the wave action on the lake. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for sandbags.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I used for gravel and they were strong.
customer_reviews.author: John Gatrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: If the water gets higher, we'll probably order more from you. Extremely satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: GMac

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive .
customer_reviews.text: That if you want it to not deteriorate in direct sun you need to cover with ground cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used them at the beach to keep the pop up tent secured.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We use these sandbags to hold our pool net down during the fall. They work great and have lasted well for two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, just the right size and well packaged. I overbought play sand earlier this year and didn't want it to go to waste. Sandbags allow me to store the excess sand indefinitely and usefully. I also appreciate that this is a small business with similar values to my own.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Zynko

customer_reviews.title: Quality bags
customer_reviews.text: Use these on my small farm to hold down tarps, insect netting, frost blanket etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They are not as sturdy as I thought they would be. Theybare kind of thin. They did hold up my pop up tent, which is what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: S. P.

customer_reviews.title: Dorian averted!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these right after seeing the initial track for hurricane Dorian. Arrived before the course was changed. We will be more than prepared next time!
customer_reviews.author: BEAU WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were hoping for - strong and easy to close with self ties. We filled each bag not quite half way with about 20# sand each (easy to manage and lift) to fit around a window well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well and if needed, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Nice big bags I found led about 5 so far and although a bit heavy no leaks strong bags
customer_reviews.author: Lola, LI, NY

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Very good product,I loaded mine with pea gravel for my lawn umbrella. The green blends in good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well made sandbag.
customer_reviews.text: What can I write about a sandbag? It's well made, and it protected my basement during a heavy rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Durable Bags
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review the bags. Now that i have used these to save my driveway from repeated flash flooding, I am impressed. I have had to move the bags on and off to clear for comings and goings and the bags have stood up to UV's for a few weeks now. Good product. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Spine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to reinforce one side of a drain ditch. We had 4 1/2 in of rain and they stayed put. They worked great and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags and great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Used these to reinforce a slope in my backyard where our pool is. They are working great and feel they are sturdy and well built. Hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: JB357

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about an empty bag, filled em up put em out, will see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Ol timer DM.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: great product. Very sturdy material. holds up to rock and gravel that I use to put brush pile in my favorite lake.
customer_reviews.author: basser 1.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading ad/picture. The bags arrived in plastic wrap instead of in a box as advertised. Gave me the impression that I received less than I should have.
customer_reviews.author: Malcom Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased so not sure how it will work longterm, but I have filled them up and they seem like a good purchase for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have filled and put out and so far holding up and happy with product
customer_reviews.author: lisa

product_meta.title: Sandbags for Flooding, Size: 14" x 26", Sand Bag - Flood Water Barrier - Tent Sandbags - Store Bags by Sandbaggy (10 Bags)
feature_bullets: WIDELY TRUSTED: Sandbaggy sandbags are used by many government agencies, landscapers/contractors, and nonprofits including the US Army and Red Cross. They are the #1 best selling sandbags on the Internet, with over 4 million Sandbaggy Sandbags installed across this great country. Whether for hurricanes on the East Coast or flooding in the Midwest, Sandbaggy sandbags have been there every step of the way as the first and last line of defense for the homes and businesses of everyday Americans.

MILITARY GRADE: Used by the US Army, Sandbaggy sandbags are truly military grade (and military green too). With a double stitched bottom and a 50 lb weight capacity, these heavy duty Sandbaggy Sandbags can be filled with sand or gravel. Our sandbags have a 14-inch wide opening, making them easy to fill and use.

UV PROTECTION: Made with a UV Inhibitor that allows sandbag to last 6 months under direct sunlight in hot, sunny places such as California, Florida, and Arizona. In cooler regions of the country, our sandbags can last 6 to 24 months depending on the amount of sun exposure on a day to day basis.

CUSTOMERS LOVE THEM: “These bags did the job perfectly!” - Allan L. “Bags were sturdy, very well made. Would def buy again.” - S. Hoffman. “Amazing sandbags. Ordered multiple times” - Christopher R. Sandbaggy has been in business for more than 10 years.
